message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
My turn. I'll take a little more this time, but it's still a decent deal for you before inflation eats away at your share.
I'll take a bit less than before, but still more than you offered me
Alice, inflation is hitting you hard.  This is a generous offer considering the circumstances. Take it before it's too late!
I'll take a bit less, but I'm not desperate yet
Alice, the clock is ticking, and your money is disappearing.  This is my final offer - take it or leave it!
